programme.desc: As tax time rolls around, IRS agents are being murdered and the team must find the killer.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio takes confession with a New York City Cardinal who is one of only a few people who know of the deadly crime he committed in his past. Meanwhile, Miami's fiercest gang seeks revenge on a rival gang member and opens fire at his mother's funeral.

programme.desc: The team investigates when a family is trapped on a burning boat in shark-infested waters.

programme.desc: In a deserted mansion, the CSIs find a hanging body that appears to have been killed by a vampire.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
